dashboard.title: System Overview
dashboard.subtitle: Overall operational status and key metrics of Tiang Ops AI system

planes.title: Plane Management
planes.subtitle: Manage system planes and their hierarchical dependencies

topology.title: Plane Topology Structure
topology.subtitle: Display hierarchical relationships and dependency structures between planes

dependency.title: Plane Dependency Complexity Analysis
dependency.subtitle: Analyze dependency complexity and risk levels of each plane

riskExplanation.title: Risk Level Explanation
riskExplanation.low: Low Risk: Simple dependencies, complexity score < 10
riskExplanation.medium: Medium Risk: Moderate dependencies, complexity score 10-20
riskExplanation.high: High Risk: Complex dependencies, complexity score > 20

operations.title: Operation Instructions
operations.levelContent: The system adopts a layered architecture design, from bottom-layer infrastructure to top-layer business scenarios. Each plane has clear responsibilities and dependencies.
operations.managementContent: Supports basic operations like creating, editing, and deleting planes, as well as topology visualization and dependency analysis.

levelDetails.l1Desc: Bottom-layer resources, no dependencies on other planes
levelDetails.l3Desc: Depends on middleware and infrastructure planes
levelDetails.l4Desc: Depends on business system and middleware planes
levelDetails.l5Desc: Depends on business chain, business system and infrastructure

features.title: Features
features.multipleDependencySupportDesc: Support one plane depending on multiple planes
features.complexityAnalysisDesc: Automatically analyze dependency complexity and risk levels
features.realTimeMonitoringDesc: Plane status monitoring based on entity health status
features.riskAssessmentDesc: Assess plane risk levels based on dependency complexity

formLabels.planeNameHelp: Unique identifier name for the plane, used for internal system reference
formLabels.displayNameHelp: User-friendly name displayed in the interface
formLabels.levelHelp: Select the level position of the plane in the system architecture
formLabels.dependenciesHelp: Select other planes that this plane depends on
formLabels.iconHelp: Icon character used to identify the plane
formLabels.statusHelp: Set the current operational status of the plane

preview.title: Plane Preview
preview.subtitle: Preview the display effect of the plane card

solutions.title: Industry Models
solutions.subtitle: Predefined industry business scenarios, entity models and relationship architectures for rapid model development.

entities.title: Entity Management
entities.subtitle: Manage various entity objects including reports, business links, systems, APIs, databases, etc.
entities.description: Unified management of various entity objects in the system, including reports, business links, systems, APIs, databases, etc., providing complete entity lifecycle management.
entities.searchPlaceholder: Search entity name, description or tags
entities.relationshipGraphDesc: Interactive relationship graph based on D3.js, showing complete technical architecture relationships from business scenarios to infrastructure.

relationships.title: Relationship Graph
relationships.subtitle: Visualize relationship networks and dependency structures between entities

sequences.title: Sequence Management
sequences.subtitle: Manage business sequence definitions and execution processes
sequences.description: Manage and visualize business sequence processes in the system, supporting sequence diagram design and process analysis.

agents.title: AI Agents
agents.subtitle: AI Agent management and monitoring center

reports.title: Report Management
reports.subtitle: Unified management of various analysis reports generated by the system, supporting report creation, editing, publishing and sharing

card.defaultDescription: This is a detailed report about {{type}}, containing various system metrics analysis and recommendations. The report is rich in content and accurate in data, providing strong support for decision-making.

detail.title: Report Detail
detail.notFoundDesc: The report you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted

tasks.title: Task Management
tasks.subtitle: Manage various tasks and execution status in the system

inspection.title: Inspection Tasks
inspection.subtitle: Manage and execute system inspection tasks, periodically trigger task collection execution, support health checks, performance monitoring, security scanning and other inspection types.

tips.createHint: After creating an inspection task, you can configure specific task collections and scheduling rules in the details page.

hooks.title: Hook Tasks
hooks.subtitle: Manage and configure system Hook tasks, trigger task collection execution based on events, support Webhook, database, message queue and other Hook types.

tips.createHint: After creating a Hook task, you can configure specific trigger events and task collections in the details page.

collections.title: Task Collections
collections.subtitle: Task collection management and batch execution

actionDescriptions.healthCheck: Check the operational status and health metrics of targets
actionDescriptions.faultAnalysis: Analyze anomalies and potential faults of targets
actionDescriptions.performanceAnalysis: Analyze performance metrics and bottlenecks of targets
actionDescriptions.securityScan: Scan security vulnerabilities and risks of targets

tips.createHint: After creating a task collection, you can add specific monitoring targets and inspection actions in the details page.

messages.configWizardComingSoon: Data Source Configuration Wizard Coming Soon
messages.wizardFeatures: Supports visual configuration of connection parameters, connection testing, batch import and other features

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.subtitle: Intelligent conversation assistant and Q&A
aiAssistant.emptyMessage: No conversation history yet, start with your first question!

suggestions.createPlane: How to create a new plane?
suggestions.entityRelation: How to manage relationships between entities?

responses.createPlane:
Steps to create a plane:
1. Go to Plane Management page
2. Click 'Create Plane' button
3. Fill in basic plane information (name, description, etc.)
4. Configure plane properties and rules
5. Save and activate the plane

Note the uniqueness of plane names and accuracy of descriptions.
responses.entityRelation:
Entity relationship management includes:
1. Define entity types and attributes
2. Establish associations between entities
3. Configure relationship constraints
4. Visualize relationship graphs
5. Monitor relationship changes

Recommend planning the entity model before configuration.
responses.healthMonitor:
System health monitoring features:
1. Real-time monitoring of component status
2. Set health thresholds and alerts
3. Generate health reports
4. Historical trend analysis
5. Exception event tracking

You can view overall health status through the dashboard.
responses.dependency:
Plane dependency configuration:
1. Analyze dependencies between planes
2. Set dependency types and strength
3. Detect circular dependency issues
4. Optimize dependency structure
5. Monitor dependency changes

Avoid creating overly complex dependency relationships.
responses.tagManagement:
Tag management features:
1. Create and edit tags
2. Assign tags to entities
3. Classify and filter based on tags
4. Tag usage statistics
5. Tag hierarchy management

A reasonable tag system helps improve management efficiency.
responses.reportGeneration:
Report generation process:
1. Select report type and template
2. Configure report parameters and data sources
3. Set report generation cycle
4. Automatically generate and distribute reports
5. Report archiving and management

Supports multiple format report exports.
responses.sequenceManagement:
Sequence management features:
1. Define business sequence processes
2. Configure sequence nodes and conditions
3. Monitor sequence execution status
4. Exception handling and retry mechanisms
5. Sequence performance analysis

Ensure correctness and reliability of sequence logic.
responses.aiAgent:
AI Agent management:
1. Create and configure agents
2. Train and optimize models
3. Deploy and monitor agents
4. Agent collaboration and scheduling
5. Performance evaluation and improvement

Agents can automate complex tasks.
responses.default:
Thank you for your question! I'm the AI assistant for the Tiang Ops system, and I can help you with:

 Understanding system features and operations
 Answering technical questions and best practices
 Providing configuration advice and troubleshooting
 Assisting with system optimization and management

Please let me know what help you need, and I'll do my best to answer.
